title: Canvas, which is available to OpenAI’s paid subscribers, is a little bit like an AI-powered Google Docs. Here’s how to use it.
content: ChatGPT Canvas is a new way to collaborate with ChatGPT's AI. Canvas works like an AI-powered Google Docs. You can write text or code, and edit the output of the chatbot. It's available for Enterprise, Pro, or Plus users for $20 a month.
author: David Nield
